index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL AND HEALTH SERVICES
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Public Health Department; authorizing execution of a contract with the Washington State Department of Social and Health Services, and contingently establishing an Indochinese Refugee Screening Project, increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1979 Budget of said Department, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund, and declaring the Emergency therefor.
